Professional Experience

Senior Software Engineer – Data Automation

Eurofins IT, Bangalore, India

July 2022 – August 2024

  • Designed and implemented a scalable data pipeline (ETL) for tenant data from 38 Azure tenants, enabling efficient integration and compliance reporting using Python, Azure Data Factory, and Power BI.
  • Led a team of six as Scrum Master for a data migration project, delivering ahead of schedule by coordinating SharePoint data migration and implementing best practices for validation and monitoring.
  • Developed a PowerApps app integrated with SQL Stored Procedures for internal data tracking, automating data entry across 146 office locations and improving data consistency.
  • Automated migration of 6TB of unstructured data from multiple on-premises SharePoint servers to Azure Blob Storage and SharePoint Online, ensuring scalability.
  • Built M365 activity log pipelines that decreased audit time by 70% through automated data validation, transformation, and loading.

Software Engineer

Eurofins IT, Bangalore, India

June 2018 – June 2022

  • Created and deployed scheduled jobs using Azure DevOps to consolidate application logs from 18 servers across 3 environments into a unified database.
  • Developed the Eurofins travel request portal, reducing processing time from 10 days to 3 days and enabling real-time data access via PowerBI for reporting and cost analysis.
  • Built a web app and automated data loading using C# into a SharePoint List to provide dynamic email distribution lists (1600 entries) to over 60,000 users.
